TopicTitle: [.20.2] Aerotech Industries - 100+ designs of all types!

Articles.Content:
*Outdated*

Screenshots modified with imagemagick: mogrify -resize 1280x720 -format jpg *.png

Series Explanation

-----

Premiere - all new work not heavily drawing on any previous designs

Classic Released - the sum of all work up until the release on Christmas Eve 2012

Classic Unreleased - the sum of all work up until January 15 when I took a break

Summer Update - a mix of updated old and brand new designs

Edited July 25, 2014 by Jason_25
please tell me wich mods you used in the Carrier article 6

please tell me wich mods you used in the Carrier article 6

Thanks for your interest. Sorry about the mod trouble. The blue water ships also use the Toaster Tech Industries Nuclear Reactors. Specifically, they use the large TX500s reactor. Careful, the reactor can melt down under a heavy load! Here is the link for the mod:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/toaster-powered-wip-nuclear-reactors-tx-100-v0-1a/

If you have any further trouble just say so, and I will try to help out.

wooooooowwwwwww...... this is a LOTTTTT of ships man! it makes me realize just how crude my stuff is next to yours...... Great jobe dude! although, you may want to use spoiler tags so the whole page isn't taken up with the pictures....

Pretty Cool!

Thanks!

wooooooowwwwwww...... this is a LOTTTTT of ships man! it makes me realize just how crude my stuff is next to yours...... Great jobe dude! although, you may want to use spoiler tags so the whole page isn't taken up with the pictures....

Thank you for the compliment! I'm sure if you spent as much time as I have you could have done the same. Spoiler tags are disabled on the forum right now because they did not work right.

I have just posted a new group of vehicles making the lineup comprehensive enough for any type of mission. This release is a celebration of all the hard work that has surely gone into making KSP what it is. Let me know what you think!
